name: ABNewPersonViewControllerDelegate
desc: The ABNewPersonViewControllerDelegate protocol declares the interface that ABNewPersonViewController delegates must implement.DeprecatedUse CNContactViewControllerDelegate instead.

items.name: func newPersonViewController(ABNewPersonViewController, didCompleteWithNewPerson: ABRecord?)
items.desc: Sent when the user taps Save or Cancel. If the user tapped Save, the current address book has been saved to the Address Book database.
